org.ietf.nea.pt.socket

Interface Authenticator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAuthenticationClient, DefaultAuthenticationServer

    public interface Authenticator
    Generic authentication handler for an IETF socket transport connection. It uses the SASL framework to authenticate the connection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authenticate(SocketMessenger connection)
      Executes the authentication with a remote peer.
      PtTlsSaslResultEnum getAuthenticationResult()
      Returns the result of the authentication after a call to authenticate(SocketMessenger).
      AuthenticatorTypeEnum getType()
      Returns the type of the implemented authenticator.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        AuthenticatorTypeEnum getType()
        Returns the type of the implemented authenticator.
        Returns:
        the type as enum constant (Server or Client)

      • authenticate

        void authenticate(SocketMessenger connection)
                  throws ValidationException,
                         ConnectionException,
                         SerializationException
        Executes the authentication with a remote peer.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if an error occurs at message serialization
        ValidationException - if an error occurs at message parsing
        ConnectionException - if the connection is broken

      • getAuthenticationResult

        PtTlsSaslResultEnum getAuthenticationResult()
        Returns the result of the authentication after a call to authenticate(SocketMessenger).
        Returns:
        the result or null if unknown because authentication is pending
